raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual exhibits a strong preference for emotionally impactful narratives, particularly in genres that include drama and feel-good themes. Ratings consistently reflect a favoring of high-quality acting and storytelling, often awarding five-star ratings for well-executed character development and relatable plots. A notable emphasis on character-driven dramas suggests a desire for depth and engagement in the material.

Content-wise, they favor productions with mature themes, including violence and complex social issues, yet also demonstrate a sensitivity toward excessive foul language. Positive sentiments are frequently expressed for family-oriented selections, indicating an enjoyment of uplifting or heartwarming storylines. 

Price sensitivity does not seem overtly pronounced, as purchases include various quality productions regardless of price points, suggesting a focus on value and satisfaction over cost. The individual appreciates a range of content but favors those with positive, encouraging messages or strong relational dynamics, particularly in family or community settings. Overall, their preferences lean toward compelling narratives that evoke a strong emotional response while remaining mindful of language and thematic appropriateness.

target_interaction.title: ... was worth seeing this movie as it had a good message about overcoming grief
target_interaction.text: It was worth seeing this movie as it had a good message about overcoming grief. But taking a risk to help someone out.
